ratings.comment: I learnt nothing. Almost everything was covered in 521.

No lecture notes until one week before final, and grading expectation was never clear. Homework and exams are mostly reasonable, but sometimes it randomly gets extremely hard (such as on the Midterm and last HW). I appreciate his desire to make Topology accessible, but covering the same thing in 3 layers of abstraction is unnecessary.

DON'T take his course! Did not follow the textbook, because he is too arrogant. If his teaching method is that "prefect" as he imagine, he can surely wrote his own textbook, and recommend other universities to use. However, this has not become reality. I respect that you graduate from Princeton, but this doesn't automatically implies well teaching.
